All courses I taught since 2021 are at École des Mines, Nancy, France

Lectures

* Nov 2023 - Dec 2023, **Graph theory: shortest path problem **(Master)

Study of three algorithms, Bellman-Ford, Dijkstra, and A*, with a focus on correctness and optimality proofs. Notes (in french) Exercises - Bellman-Ford Exercises - A*
